<div id="features-box" class="container features" style="text-align: center;">

<!-- Heading -->
<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-8  col-md-offset-2 devborder devbg">

  <p id="heading">OpenRepGrid Docu</p>
  
  <p class="marketing-byline devborder devbg">You love repertory grids? So do we! 
  Find out about a powerful tool to analyze your grids!</p>
  
  <hr class="soften">
  
</div>   
</div>

<!-- ----------- ROW 1 ------------- -->
<div class="row">

<!-- About -->
<div class="col-md-4 devborder devbg">
  <i class="fa fa-star fa-5x"></i>
  <h2>Analyze grids!</h2>
  <p class="marketingtext">
  <a href="http://www.openrepgrid.org">OpenRepGrid</a> is a software for <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Repertory_grid">repertory grids</a>, 
  	a qualitative-quantitative research technique used across various domains from clinical psychology to marketing.</p>
</div>   

<!-- Desktop / Systems -->
<div class="col-md-4 devborder devbg">
  <i class="fa fa-desktop fa-5x"></i>
  <h2>All system.</h2>
  <p class="marketingtext">
  All systems - no constraints. Whether you use MacOS, Windows or Linux. OpenRepGrid runs on every major operating system.</p>
</div>

<!-- It's an add-on -->
<div class="col-md-4 devborder devbg">
<i class="fa fa-download fa-5x"></i>
<h2>It's an add-on.</h2>
<p class="marketingtext">
OpenRepGrid is a free add-on package for the statistical [R software](http://www.r-project.org/). Sounds difficult? It's not! Just go ahead and <a href="installation.html">install</a> it.
</div>

</div>

<!-- ----------- ROW 2 ------------- -->
<div class="row">

<!-- Features  -->
<div class="col-md-4 devborder devbg">
<i class="fa fa-cubes fa-5x"></i>
<h2>Features.</h2>
<p class="marketingtext">
OpenRepGrid already offers a variety of [analysis features](features.html) for grids. 
The long term goal is to create a software that offers about anything you need.</p>
</div>

<!-- Documentation -->
<div class="col-md-4 devborder devbg">
<i class="fa fa-book fa-5x"></i>
<h2>Documented.</h2>
<p class="marketingtext">
There is an evergrowing documentation containing descriptions and examples for all analysis features. You have another great example? Just [add it!](contribute.html)</p>
</div>

<!-- Join the community -->
<div class="col-md-4 devborder devbg">
<i class="fa fa-users fa-5x"></i>
<h2>Get on board.</h2>
<p class="marketingtext">
OpenRepGrid is a collaborative project. You have great ideas, feature requests, general questions or suggestions? [Just get on board!](contribute.html)</p>
</div>

</div>  

<!-- ----------- ROW 3 ------------- -->
<div class="row">

<!-- Build features -->
<div class="col-md-4 devborder devbg">
<i class="fa fa-wrench fa-5x"></i>
<h2>Add features.</h2>
<p class="marketingtext">If you know some R, you can easily program new features for OpenRepGrid yourself. This way you can spread your ideas within the grid community.</p>
</div>

<!-- Generating reports -->
<div class="col-md-4 devborder devbg">
<i class="fa fa-file-photo-o fa-5x"></i>
<!-- <img class="marketing-img" src="assets/img/bs-docs-bootstrap-features.png"> -->
<h2>Generate reports.</h2>
<p class="marketingtext">You need to regularly generate reports based on grid data, e.g. for clinical assessment. OpenRepGrid makes this an easy task.</p>
</div>
      
<!-- Newsletter -->
<div class="col-md-4 devborder devbg">
<i class="fa fa-envelope-o fa-5x"></i>
<h2>Newsletter.</h2>
<p class="marketingtext">
You want to stay up to date on OpenRepGrid? 
<a href="http://eepurl.com/4h0t9" target="_blank">Subsribe to the newsletter!</a>
Don't worry! There will be a few mails per year only.
</p>
</div>
   
</div>
